description: Back and more technical than ever, bring the Men’s ROM 2.0 Softshell Hoody on never-ending trails and peak bagging trips. The GORE-TEX® Infinium™ Windstopper® fabric membrane sheds rain, plus offers superior wind resistance and breathability. If the gusts gain speed, use the fixed hood with a single-pull adjustment, cord lock at the hem, and VELCRO® cuffs to block drafts. Stow small gear in this midlayer's zippered hand, chest, and interior pockets.
name: Marmot ROM 2.0 Hoody - Mens
